message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for around $18,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for. Could you do $15,000? That feels like a fairer compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
